name: Positive - When dimension is 1 hover should stay in the same position no matter the instructions

testSteps.description: 1: Positive - When dimension is 1 hover should stay in the same position no matter the instructions ({Instructions=NNESEESWNWW})

children.description:
Given A room of dimension
| x | y |
| 1 | 1 |

And Set the initial position of the Hover to
| x | y |
| 0 | 0 |

And Set the dirt patches
| x | y |
| 0 | 0 |
And I set the instructions "NNESEESWNWW"
When Send a POST request to "/cleaning-sessions"
POST
POST
Then Validate the response code is 200

Then Validate the response body
| patches | 1 |
| coords | [ 0, 0] |
